Description:
NPE occurs when select some operations in the operation selection page[0707]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070419-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a ws datasource from http://xignite14.xignite.com/xcalendar.asmx?WSDL
2, New a ws dataset
3, Select some operations in XigniteCalendarHttpPost

Expected result:
No exception, be able to do the next operation
Actual result:
NPE Throws out, the next button is gray
